title: (x) Embroided "The Little Red Rooster" child-like script - One Stroke Script {Angel}
content:
No i wassnt asking if you were hungry... anyone know the font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LtlRed.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093127/http:/typophile.com/files/LtlRed.jpg) | 5.06 KB |
author: planet_embroidery

comments.content:
This seems to resemble [VanDijk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093127/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/van-dijk/) that has been backslanted to vertical, or possibly [Graphite Narrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093127/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/graphite/).

- Mike Yanega
No wonder it looked familiar... [One Stroke Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093127/http:/www.identifont.com/show?32T).
Thanks for your efforts guys.... Angel71 you nailed it.
